channel.title: Wicket library: new and updated contributions
channel.description: New and updated contribution listed on wicket-library.com

item.title: Flow4J
item.description:
Version 0.9.4 for Eclipse 2.1.* and 3.*
Flow4J is a plugin for the eclipse IDE that enables the modelling of process flows in a drag and drop manner. Building a Flow4J project creates the flow's java source code which is then compiled by the JDT plugin. Process steps, called flowlets, can be written in java and placed in the Flow4J project. The Plug-in uses the eclipse-gef framework.
